name: Library of Myth
description:
Welcome to the library of myths, where are you will explore ancient Greek Myths in a series of mini-games to play out in any order. The story and instructions will appear on the screen; as you play do the games, you will learn a bit of each of the myths presented.

1. Icarus

2. The River Styx

3. Athena versus Arachne

Development:

This game was created in just over a week for the historically accurate game jam. This game is still under development, and we plan to continue editing it after the gym. 

Credits:

Royalty Free Music from Bensound

This game was made with help from Amber Dickinson; she helped with the ideas for the mini-games and concept of the game, as well as brainstorming, and the art from the Icarus stage, and tapestries from Athena versus Arachne.
